system.description:
Eccentric, curious, and perpetually optimistic, gnomes are cheerfulâ€”especially when compared to their typically grumpier and larger kin, the dwarves. Known for their tinkering, spreading cheer, and playful antics, gnomes pursue their passions with a scatterbrained enthusiasm.

Optimistic

Allow an ally within Reach 6 to reroll any single die. Resets when healed to your max HP.

-1 Speed [M]

You know Dwarvish if your INT is not negative (but you call it Gnomish, of course) [M]
